channel.title: Cant run, when I added a shop
channel.description:
Here's the line I added in shops.cfg
[code]shop = 74 Custom_Items 2 2 5500 100 5501 100 5502 100 5503 100 5504 100 5507 100 5506 100 5510 100 5511 100 5512 100 5513 100 5514 100 5516 100 5520 100 5525 100 5529 100 5531 100 5533 100[/code]
Here's what I get when I run server:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 501 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:128) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code]
What happened?
EDIT - The actualy code I had was cleaner than that.

item.title: Cant run, when I added a shop
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

There’s a digit limit? I used:

10000000

Read full topic

item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

You gotta use tabs in cfg files, this always happens when you use spaces not tabs…

item.title: Cant run, when I added a shop
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Here’s the line I added in shops.cfg

shop = 74	Custom_Items				2	2	5500	100	5501 	100	5502 	100	5503 	100	5504 	100	5507 	100	5506	100	5510 	100	5511 	100	5512	100	5513	100	5514 	100	5516 	100	5520	100	5525 	100	5529 	100	5531 	100	5533 	100

Here’s what I get when I run server:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 501 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:128) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)

What happened?

EDIT - The actualy code I had was cleaner than that.
